body: I added an error when methods are called on numbers. Separate from that - i was looking through aten ops and the cases I could think of where you would want num and tensors to be interchangeable already accept both. I think it would be better to identify the ops that should be interchangeable and aren't currently and add it to the op instead of the compiler.
